content.text:
# List of international presidential trips made by Lee Jae Myung

This is a list of international presidential trips made by Lee Jae Myung, the 14th president of South Korea. Lee Jae Myung has made 5 international trips to 4 countries during his presidency, which began on 4 June 2025.
Summary
The number of visits per country where President Lee traveled are:
* One visit to: Canada, Japan, Malaysia, UAE, Egypt, South Africa, Turkey
* Two visit to: the United States
2025
